text.section: Except for an organization described in subsection (a)(2) or (3) of this section, a society that is exempt from this subtitle may not give, allow, or promise to give or allow to any person compensation for obtaining new members.

The provisions of this subtitle relating to medical examination, valuation of benefit certificates, and incontestability do not apply to a society that:
provides benefits in case of death or disability resulting solely from accident; and
does not obligate itself to pay natural death or sickness benefits.

By examination or otherwise, the Commissioner may require information from any society or association that will enable the Commissioner to determine whether the society or association is exempt from this subtitle.
